title: I recall an old railroad story about a locomotive running into a ship and sinking it many years ago.  Any truth to that?  They story I recall was that the locomotive was switching cars at the old Smith Creek rail yard, couldn\'t stop after pulling some cars, rolled down the hill towards the docks and into the side of a ship being loaded/unloaded and sank the ship.
text:
I have not found anything on it yet, but still looking into it with
another reporter. We'll let you know if anything comes up! Thanks!
